The Portal Awakens

As a consequence of a perilous dare, three eleven year old children went into the neglected storeroom (not aware of the dangers)...where a portal awoke! They thought they had hit a dead end, but found it was just the beginning of their journey... Ebony black was all they saw as they got sucked into the portal and ended up at an anonymous, bewitched land full of surprises. William, Jayde and Lewis face a strenuous realm of challenges. The secret to escape is to work as a team, can they get along? They have to find a way out. Will they escape?
